description:
Everyone heads to the spa town of Hosenka for some R&R after a job. There, the gang coincidentally runs into Loke! As usual, Loke keeps his distance from Lucy, but something is different about him from before... Then, suddenly, Loke makes a stunning confessions to Lucy! His incredible, unspeakable truth is... Loke`s secrets that no one knows will be revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Star Removed from the Sky
A estrela que não pode retornar ao céu!
